DOC.brief_summary: This study assess efficacy , safety , tolerability 2 dose oral fingolimod ( 1.25 mg/day 0.5 mg/day ) compare placebo patient relapsing-remitting multiple sclerosis ( RRMS )
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Fingolimod Patients With Relapsing-remitting Multiple Sclerosis
DOC.criteria: Male female patient age 1855 diagnosis multiple sclerosis Patients relapsingremitting disease course Patients EDSS score 05.5 Patients chronic disease immune system , malignancy , acute pulmonary disease , cardiac failure , etc . Pregnant nursing woman Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion apply study .
